snippet: Standing before rows of bikes at Queens Borough Hall, Councilman Peter F. Vallone Jr. detailed a bill to make motorcycle parking free in the city.
abstract: New York City Councilman Peter F Vallone Jr details a bill to make motorcycle parking free in the city; motorcycles are subject to Muni-Meter rates, but riders say enforcement is inconsistent and that meter receipts are often stolen or damaged by weather, leading to unjustified parking tickets.
lead_paragraph: Standing before rows of bikes at Queens Borough Hall, Councilman Peter F. Vallone Jr. detailed a bill to make motorcycle parking free in the city.

headline.seo: Peter Vallone Jr., Defending Motorcycle Riders From Those Pesky New Meters
headline.main: Councilman Proposes a Bill to Let Motorcyclists Park Free
headline.print_headline: Councilman Proposes a Bill to Let Motorcyclists Park Free
